tasks.task: Building cold frames under a black walnut tree
subtasks: Moving snow from the designated area
Cutting boards for the cold frames
Assembling the bottom rectangles of the cold frames
Constructing the top sections of the cold frames
Securing the edges and sides of the cold frames
Filling the cold frames with soil
Attaching Tuftex panels to the cold frames as covers
Adding hinges for easy access to the cold frames

tasks.task: Mulching the area around the cold frames
subtasks: Applying mulch to the ground around the cold frames

tasks.task: Planting herbs or plants in the cold frames
subtasks: Selecting appropriate plants for the kitchen garden
Transferring plants or seeds into the cold frames

tasks.task: Verifying the functionality of the hinges
subtasks: Checking if the hinges need reinforcement
Planning to construct additional cold frames in the future
Collecting materials needed for further constructions
Ensuring that there is enough space for expansion
